title: How to Make Teriyaki Grilled Corn

steps.headline: Make the teriyaki glaze.
steps.description: In a small sauce pot, combine the brown sugar, tomato paste, cornstarch, water, and sesame seeds. Constantly whisk the mixture and bring it to a boil. Allow it to simmer for a minute on a lower heat.

steps.headline: Grill the corn.
steps.description: Leave them in a covered grill for about 5 to 10 minutes.

steps.headline: Glaze the corn.
steps.description: Before removing them, use a baste brush to cover the corn with the teriyaki glaze. Turn over and repeat a few times.

text: Make the teriyaki glaze. In a small sauce pot, combine the brown sugar, tomato paste, cornstarch, water, and sesame seeds. Constantly whisk the mixture and bring it to a boil. Allow it to simmer for a minute on a lower heat. Grill the corn. Leave them in a covered grill for about 5 to 10 minutes. Glaze the corn. Before removing them, use a baste brush to cover the corn with the teriyaki glaze. Turn over and repeat a few times. Finished.
